programme.title: Talk Back and You're Dead
programme.desc: Samantha, an intelligent but naive woman, falls in love with Top, the hot-headed delinquent leader of the Lucky 13 gang. Over time, she wonders if her relationship is worth saving.

programme.title: Ang Panday
programme.desc: Flavio, a young warrior, fights against the sinister entity, Lizardo, who plans to conquer the world, to prevent humanity's demise.

programme.title: Nag-Aapoy Na Laman
programme.desc: Two men try to reclaim the woman of their dreams.

programme.title: Unang Tibok NG Puso
programme.desc: Arnel returns to the Philippines from the USA and runs into his childhood friend Lena. The two rekindle their relationship, but things get complicated when Arnel's girlfriend pays him a visit.

programme.title: Iskalawag: Ang Batas ay Batas
programme.desc: Alex, an honest policeman, is disheartened by the rampant corruption among his senior officers. To make matters worse, he is faced with a choice to expose his father for working with organized crime.

programme.title: Rollerboys
programme.desc: Busty and his group of roller skaters challenge Christian and his group to a game of Roller Blade, betting that Christian's group would lose to them.

programme.title: Mariano Mison... NBI
programme.desc: Mariano Mison, an agent known for his dedication and integrity, earns the NBI's director post because of his service. When the Vizconde family is shockingly massacred, he is tasked to investigate the murders and find the culprit.

programme.title: Suddenly It's Magic
programme.desc: Marcus, a superstar actor from Thailand, travels to the Philippines to escape the limelight. He soon meets and falls in love with Joey, a baker, despite their differing backgrounds.

programme.title: The Adventures of Pureza: Queen of the Riles
programme.desc: Pura enters a risky deal of finding a lost Brazilian model so she can pay for her brother's education. Together with her best friend Ruben, she searches for the model as they try to survive every threat they face.

programme.title: Feng Shui 2
programme.desc: Lester asks Joy for help in defeating the deadly consequences of the cursed Bagua mirror.

programme.title: Home Along da Riles 2
programme.desc: Kevin, who struggles to raise his four children due to financial problems, suddenly becomes a millionaire. Then, he moves into a bigger house, which leads to hilarious situations.

programme.title: The Ghosting
programme.desc: A man believes a girl and a house have something to do with weird deaths in the neighborhood.

programme.title: Tu-Yay and His Magic Payong
programme.desc: Emilio uses his magic umbrella to transform into Tu-Yay and do the impossible to make the children he cares about happy.

programme.title: Amasona... kumakasa, pumuputok
programme.desc: Maya becomes an activist and joins a group of rebels as she is tired of her life of luxury. While under police custody for writing aggressive slogans, she meets an intelligence officer and falls in love with him.

programme.title: Si Malakas at Si Maganda
programme.desc: Oyo, a man with telekinetic powers, falls in love with Anna, a reporter who enlists his help in her investigation.

programme.title: Dalaw
programme.desc: Strange things start happening when a family moves to a new house. The mother soon learns that they are being targeted by a supernatural visitor, and she must find a way to keep it from causing her family harm.

programme.title: Can We Still Be Friends?
programme.desc: Digs and Sam break up and keep tabs on each other's relationships.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Amy Rouse and her Border Collie Mist trains for the English National Sheepdog Trials. Quebec's MIRA foundation provides assistance dogs for children with autism. Buddy, a hero dog, guides an Alaskan State Trooper to his owner's workshop.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: Dogs and diabetes - how does it work? Whizz provides therapeutic benefits to children with special needs. Pups in Prison are trained by inmates over a period of 16 months.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: A Staffordshire Bull Terrier Diesel who is able to locate cheetah faecal droppings. Ozzie is one of only three dogs in the world who is trained to detect poisonous Cane Toads.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: How are dogs trained to guide the blind and visually impaired? Border Collies at Johannesburg International Airport are used to chase birds and in Japan, new puppies are born and bred to become guide dogs in future.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs
programme.desc: We follow two teams of dogs as they prepare for the toughest international sled dog races in the world. Labradors trained to detect fire ants in Australia and a new way to track ringed seals in the artic - dogs.

programme.title: Extraordinary Dogs

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2

programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a future where bio-threats present one of the greatest existential risks that humanity has ever faced. From viruses to man-made pandemics and synthetic bio-weapons, technology is accelerating the risks of man-made threats.

programme.title: Edge Of Existence
programme.desc: Edge of Existence explores a near-future where artificial intelligence rules the planet, and us. AI will arrive in our life-times bringing with it the biggest existential risk humanity has ever faced.

programme.title: Inside Africa: ?Inside Africa's 25th Anniversary: Lupita & Angelique at the Met
programme.desc: As part of?Inside Africa's?25th anniversary, we have a sit-down between two of the continent's most celebrated voices: Angelique Kidjo?and Lupita Nyong'o. The setting is The Met's newly reimagined?Arts of Africa?gallery, a powerful space in which to reflect on African creativity, identity, and legacy. Five-time Grammy award winning Kidjo and Oscar-winning actor Nyong'o reflect on their careers and the rise and influence of African culture across the world.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Pixie forget about their little sisters and their plans to hang out. Scallop goes to Unicorn Land and meets Juniper. They play and become friends. / The unicorns are eager to play with a new mystery item that washes up on the beach, but what is it? While the other unicorns come up with imaginative ideas of what it could be, Pixie is determined to find out exactly what it is.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: When Pixies pet crab goes into a cave, Kelp uses his knowledge of crabs under the sea to coax him out using dance and rhythm. / Scallops special shell is broken, but Kelp transforms the broken bits into something even more special.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When theres a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: Burple gets spooked by the legend of a ghost called the Phantom Fang. But when he senses the story is real, he can't get his friends to believe him.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: After Magnus accuses Cutter of setting fires near the village that could hurt the sheep, the Riders have to put them out and find the real culprit.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo's treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots
programme.desc: The Duchess seeks Artephius' soul for her spell collection, and it's up to Puss to protect him. It turns out that The Duchess and Artephius have a complicated relationship.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponentsher mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien
programme.desc: Set on reclaiming his throne, Uncle King Julien convinces Julien to go into Foosa territory. Julien creates a disguise and forces Maurice to join him.

After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: The combined villains have taken over Baby Corp HQ, and a disastrous chupie teleportation accident has all the office babies scattered to the wind. Boss has to regain his leadership gusto to convince Baby Corp to regroup, as Tim and Danny share an emotional last day together before Danny leaves town for good.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.desc: One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place but everywhere they try is just too noisy I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: Inspired by real WWII events, this film follows an American submarine crew tasked with capturing a German U-boat carrying the Enigma code machine. A tense, underwater action thriller full of deception, danger, and survival.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Russell Crowe stars as Robin Hood in Ridley Scotts epic reimaginingfighting corruption and sparking a rebellion that turns a humble outlaw into a timeless symbol of freedom.

It's a land swept by incredible winds that nourish some of the most productive ecosystems of our planet inhabited by extraordinary creatures and some of the rarest animals of our Planet - the Arabian Sea Humpback Whale, Loggerhead Turtle and Arabian Wolf - as well as other incredible species such as the Arabian Chameleon, Caracal and Egyptian Vulture.

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: Our Golden Days

This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Jugglers
programme.desc: In this office romantic-comedy drama, a secretary with a passive and obedient personality meets a boss who is completely uninterested in others and has no consideration for them.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human?
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the bros!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Nezha
programme.desc: A former top team racing driver wants to prove himself in a race but accidentally hurts his teammate Lily, leading to the teams downfall. When an inexperienced virtual car racing champion joins the team and unexpectedly shines in a real-life race, can the three drivers team up to regain glory for their team?

programme.title: Extreme Ends
programme.desc: Extreme Ends is an action-adventure reality show featuring four celebrities and their special guests experiencing the diversity of Hong Kong! Join Filipino actor, model and swimmer Enchong Dee and his celebrity friend Ria, to explore the highs and lows of Hong Kong. They are eager to push their boundaries in this thrilling new adventure.

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

This unique boxing show offers all-round entertainment, with live performances, lavish costumes and real fights with blood!

programme.title: Kowloon Walled City
programme.desc: Neng was a street fighter in Northeast China but decides to start a new life in Hong Kongs Kowloon Walled City. Unfortunately, he is implicated in the fights and conspiracies among the triad forces. When his good friend is hunted down by the triad, Neng must team up with the residents of Kowloon Walled City to fight back and save his friend.

programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. programme.desc: When web model Kara gets disturbing messages from a fan, influencer Cody comes to her aid. But when the stalker begins to show up in person, "IRL" takes on a whole new level of meaning for Kara.

programme.title: To Be Announced
programme.desc: Program information is not yet available
Anton and Erika have been a couple for 12 years already. While he's not yet ready to get married, Erika waits until he is and lovingly devotes her time to him.

programme.title: Silaw
programme.desc: Six unsuspecting teens are camping on the site of Mt. Lihim ng Aguila when they trip into a missile silo controlled by a discharged ex-general. Will the teens be able to sneak out of the mess alive, or will they be forever trapped?

programme.title: Mana-Mana Tiba-Tiba
programme.desc: Wilson and Uging, by the virtue of being the first two people who visited the wake of the late Don Segundo became heirs to a two-hundred million fortune.
June (Bela Padilla) mourns the death of her boyfriend, Pao (JC Santos). In order to move forward, Marco (Zanjoe Marudo) stands as her proxy-boyfriend for 365 days.

programme.title: The Mall, The Merrier
programme.desc: Two siblings, Moira (Vice Ganda) and Morissette (Anne Curtis), feud over Tamol Mall, a mall they inherited. The feud is compounded with the arrival of their Aunt Moody.

programme.title: Trophy Wife
programme.desc: Lani (Cristine Reyes) draws Chino (Derek Ramsay), his brother, Sammy (John Estrada), and his girlfriend Gwen (Heart Evangelista) into a complex game of revenge. Will it be too late before one of the men reveals his dark side?

programme.title: Video City: Be Kind, Please Rewind
programme.desc: An uninspired filmmaker (Ruru Madrid) accidentally time travels back to the 90s at a Video City store, where he meets the woman (Yassi Pressman) who will change his life.

programme.title: Boy Golden
programme.desc: The leader of a notorious gang is released from prison. He is on the lookout for the rival gang leader who is responsible for his imprisonment and also the rape and murder of his sister. He plots and executes revenge with the help of his friends.

programme.title: Lupe, A Seaman's Wife
programme.desc: Lupe (Andrea del Rosario) and Manolo (Leandro Muoz ) are a young couple whose marriage life is about to undergo a drastic change when Manolo leaves for another country.

programme.title: Kulimlim
programme.desc: The past has come to haunt Jake Cabrera. Based on technicality, the Supreme Court has ordered the release of the three men convicted of raping his wife after eight years in prison. Jake decides to render his own brand of justice and seeks the help of a retired colonel. This is Robin Padilla's finest dramatic performance yet.

programme.title: Sa Haba ng Gabi
programme.desc: When a zombie outbreak happens, two housemaids and a driver will need to survive their longest night ever as they get trapped inside the mansion.

programme.title: Pusong Mamon
programme.desc: A funny heart warming story about three extraordinary people and their equally extraordinary relationship.

programme.title: Perfect Strangers S2 E13 - Since I Lost My Baby
programme.desc: Finding success in life is hard. Finding success while sharing an apartment with your goat herder, immigrant, distant cousin may be nearly impossible--but it does generate a lot of humor in this offbeat comedy.

programme.title: The Incredible Hulk S3 E05 - Behind The Wheel
programme.desc: You wouldn't like him when he's angry. You'll LOVE him! Follow the adventures of Dr. David Banner, a scientist who, after "an accidental overdose of gamma radiation interacts with his unique body chemistry", turns into a raging monster when agitated.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E13 - The Case of My Vanishing Master (Part I)
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: I Dream Of Jeannie S4 E14 - The Case of My Vanishing Master (Part II)
programme.desc: An astronaut's life is thrown into chaos when he discovers a bottle that contains a beautiful female genie.

programme.title: Married With Children S4 E18 - What Goes Around Came Around
programme.desc: With offbeat humor and unflinching honesty, Married With Children paints a more realistic picture of middle-class existence, warts and all for the less-than-lovable Bundys family

programme.title: Bewitched S5 E01 - Samantha's Wedding Present
programme.desc: Another year of marriage between mortal and witch has the Stephens trying to cope with Samantha's meddling, magical family and their daughter's entrance into nursery school.

programme.title: Xena: Warrior Princess S2 E13 - The Quest
programme.desc: Xena, one of the fiercest, sexiest, most self-empowered women as she travels defending the innocent from the forces of darkness. She is the very definition of girl power.

programme.title: CSI S4 E08 - After The Show
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with terrific back-to-back episodes involving serial killers ("Assume Nothing" / "For All Our Country"). There's a new politically minded sheriff in town and in "Invisible Evidence" he's ticked off that the CSI's can't get enough evidence to convict a rapist/murderer. Also, Nick and Sara buck for the same promotion. Along the way there are plenty of quirky cases: one involving a museum robbery ("Suckers") and one involving a dead juror ("Eleven Angry Jurors"). Grissom travels to a small town with plenty of secrets to solve a murder in "Jackpot," Catherine dates a younger man in "Early Rollout," and Sara works a case involving a woman strikingly similar to herself in "Butterflied." There's also plenty of kinkiness in "Fur and Loathing" and tragedy "Bad Words."

programme.title: Hazardous History With Henry Winkler (S1)
programme.desc: You thought your job was tough? Uncover the dangerous gigs of the past from mercury-poisoned hat makers to kids crawling through chimneys and imagine the risks behind everyday jobs of old.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: Did you know beards can be deadly? Or that a lawnmower once killed a spectator at a football game? What if I told you someone died from drinking too much water? These are just some of the craziest deaths.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S2)
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered about the most bizarre things that have fallen from the sky? From meteorites to seafood and even bathtubs, these are some truly unbelievable stories of what comes from above.

programme.title: The Mega-Brands That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: When Motorola introduces the first handheld portable telephone to the world, the futuristic technology sets off a fierce battle among telecommunications companies to produce the most popular cell phone.

programme.title: History's Greatest Escapes With Morgan Freeman (S2)
programme.desc: A man with aspirations to writing crime novels ends up the star of his own breakout story when he tries to escape from one of Mississippi's oldest and most notorious prison farms, Parchman Penitentiary.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S5)
programme.desc: A scientist and businessman team up to develop a vitamin C-rich war ration for the troops fighting in World War 2, which unexpectedly leads to the development of frozen concentrated orange juice.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)

programme.desc: As the temperature dips well below freezing, the river stops paying dividends. The three participants are forced to weigh tapping out versus a lifetime of regret.

programme.title: Bakit May Kahapon Pa?
programme.desc: Award-winning actress Nora Aunor turned in one of her finest performances as Helen, a survivor.

programme.title: Oo Na Sige Na
programme.desc: When their relationship was discovered, Shirley was made to choose between father and boyfriend,Bonggoy.

programme.title: Agaw-Armas
programme.desc: Benjie (Bong Revilla) is a hotel security officer who has just about everything going for him. His life seems almost perfect. Then, he is linked to a shooting incident tha may forever change his life.

programme.title: Doctor, Doctor We Are Sick
programme.desc: The foursome, Vilma and TVJ played bumbling orderlies,whose work method was enough to send patients out of the hospital or to undeserved calamity, although they were, in truth, caring and kind-hearted and were only trying to do good.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in "Kahit Konting Pagtingin". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Alabang Girls (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alabang, an upscale suburb on the South of Manila, was the setting for this wacky tale of boys from the wrong side of the tracks, who easily fall for rich and pretty girls, who lived in Alabang.

programme.title: Magdusa Ka (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Dina was the daughter of Dindo and his former maid, Nida. Aware of this fact, the girl constantly dreamt that one day she would be recognized by her father and would enjoy all the comforts of his moneyed lifestyle.

programme.title: Masdan Mo Ang Mga Bata
programme.desc: Neneng was raped and eventually killed. Ruben was determined to exact revenge at all cost for the sake of his child and the other victims.

programme.title: Kuwatog
programme.desc: Child sensation Nio Muhlach plays the lovable dwarf "Kuwatog." As punishment for his many pranks, he is transformed into a human child, here to remain until he does a deed that will benefit mankind.

programme.title: Hanggang Saan, Hanggang Kailan
programme.desc: On the death of their father, the heiress, Dina sent her illegitimate sisters Alice and Vina out of her vast hacienda and even deprived them of what was rightfully theirs. A few years later, the hardworking and determined Alice returned, ready to turn the tables on her wicked sister.

programme.title: Heartache City
programme.desc: Heartache City

programme.title: Dahil Tanging Ikaw
programme.desc: Erika and Cecil are twins who were separated by poverty right after they were born. Each of them was caught up in her own existence, not knowing that somewhere not so far lived a twin. But one day, fate found a clever way to bring them back together.

programme.title: Nag-iisang Ikaw
programme.desc: Cissy (Mikee Cojuangco) started to doubt if Albert (Matthew Mendoza) was the right man for her. While working for a fashion magazine, she met a photographer, Aaron (Keempee De Leon).

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: KAIZOKU: Noshima Island
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, Noshima Island.

programme.title: BOSAI:Safe Journey in Japan
programme.desc: The number of visitors to Japan is rising. However, many do not know what to do during an earthquake, tsunami or typhoon. Find out the technologies being developed to protect visitors from disasters.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to insects. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #5 I studied by listening to the radio. / Explain how you learned Japanese by putting "de" after the method you used. For example, "rajio de", meaning "by listening to the radio".

programme.title: Sing for Ukraine, Sing for Peace
programme.desc: Ukrainian musician Kateryna gives concerts all around Japan playing the bandura. Russia's invasion prompted her to support displaced people in Japan, hoping her music will bring peace to her homeland.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: In November, the Deaflympics-an international sports competition for the hearing impaired-was held in Japan for the first time.NHK WORLD-JAPAN showed related programs,and promoted its services.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today: Tsukemono: Japan's Pickled Soul Food.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Charly is a solitary lioness from a long line of expert giraffe hunters in Africa's inhospitable Namib Desert. Her amazing story takes a new turn with a possible reunion with her two lost sisters.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Tokachi is in Japan's great northern land of Hokkaido, home to vast fields and sprawling pastures. Experience its vibrant summer colors through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: In 1985, a passenger jet crashed into Osutaka Ridge, killing 520 people. Kurosawa Kanichi looks after the area, preserving memorials and guiding bereaved family members up the mountain.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Fall #9
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: In Tokyo, we meet Syrian Iskandar Salama who works to find job opportunities for his fellow Syrians in and out of Japan, then go on a river ride in Tochigi with Nepalese Shishir Mahat as our guide.

programme.title: NEWSLINE ASIA 24
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Magical Japanese

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. They also speak to each other on the telephone. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends are going camping with Madame Gazelle. When it gets dark, they all sing a song around the campfire. When it is time for bed, Peppa and her friends get a little scared and all the children end up sleeping in Madame Gazelles tent

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George's toy basket is full and their beds are covered in toys. Mummy Pig orders a new toy cupboard, but it needs to be assembled and Mummy and Daddy Pig are not good at DIY.

programme.title: Peppa Pig

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When William and Chucks both want the same toy, they compete to see who can hold onto it the longest. // Chucks is great at giving out new nicknames, but Baby likes the name he has already.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: When Grandma loses her glasses, Baby becomes her guide for the day. // It's up to Baby and William to save the Carnivore Cove Nautical Night Fair.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and Suzy Sheep are having a quarrel and decide they are not best friends anymore. As time goes by they really miss each other but they still refuse to make up.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing in the garden with their bouncy ball when Suzy Sheep turns up with two tennis rackets. She uses the bouncy ball to play a game of tennis with Peppa, making George feel left out. Will the job of ball boy cheer him up?

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppas house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Today is Daddy Pig's birthday, but he has to go to work. While he is away, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George prepare a special birthday surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa is going for a sleepover at Zo Zebras house with Suzy Sheep, Rebecca Rabbit, Candy Cat and Emily Elephant. The girls stay up playing games and having fun. At last they feel sleepy. They all snuggle up in their sleeping bags and fall asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: It is night time and the sky is full of stars. Mummy and Daddy Pig let Peppa and George put their coats on and they go outside to look at the stars. The stars look very tiny, but when Peppa and George look through a telescope the stars look bigger.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: When Peppa and Suzy learn that grown ups must work all day, they decide to play at working in a store. But they quickly get tired of it.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 239
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 239
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Melissa Mackay brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen - Episode 3
programme.desc: Derek heads to Cambray Cheese in what he says is a town named after him - Nannup! He tries black garlic in Osmington, before watching a local dive for freshwater marron.

programme.title: Field To Feast - Episode 8
programme.desc: Drying persimmons is Korean culinary method that takes months. Thanh follows the epic journey the persimmon takes the farm, into Korean kitchen and on to his plate.

programme.title: A Brief History Of Cricket Down Under: The 80s - Rivals
programme.desc: The 1980s swept in a new professional era for international cricket players. This episode highlights the blow-ups and the great head-to-head clashes that had crowds on their feet and fans yelling at their screens.

programme.title: Restoration Australia - Orange Edwardian
programme.desc: In Orange NSW, first responders Chris and Mel have found all the cosmopolitan comforts of city living along with fresh air, big skies, open spaces and a sweet Edwardian fixer-upper called Bega.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 221
programme.desc: Your daily download of everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to key players and experts on the issues driving the news cycle.

programme.desc: A police detective, a bank robber and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

programme.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
programme.desc: There comes a time in every adolescent's life when he must fake out his parents and blow off a day of school. This is Ferris Bueller's day. A grandmaster in the game of adult manipulation.

programme.title: Entrapment
programme.desc: Following the theft of a valuable piece of artwork, Gin Baker, an insurance agent, convinces her employers to allow her to befriend an aging master thief, in order to better protect their clients.

programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: When a menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman, James Gordon and Harvey Dent must work together to put an end to the madness.

programme.desc: This is the saga of Intergalactic warrior Paul Atreides and his messianic rise to lead his people and their struggle for survival. The young hero leads his warriors against an evil baron and tries to destroy a galaxy-wide trade in 'spice.'

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Deep in the Sea
programme.desc: Suspended psychiatrist Huang is asked to treat Zhao who suffers from schizophrenia. Zhao can only release himself from the pain of his girlfriend's death by killing people in his delusion. During the treatment, Huang is gradually affected by Zhao. He soon finds the way to cure Zhao, but then discovers an important secret about himself.

programme.title: Room For Rent
programme.desc: Lonely widow Joyce rents out a room in her house and becomes dangerously obsessed with a younger guest. Desperate for love, she is willing to eliminate anyone hindering her pursuit of happiness, and a chilling tale of obsession unfolds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A school girl joins two internet content creators in a horror video project filmed in an old building behind their school. The trio encounters a bullying gang and as events unfold, it becomes clear that the girl holds a personal grudge against the gang and is blinded by hatred to exercise justice, even if it means sacrificing the innocents

programme.title: An Unquiet Grave
programme.desc: A year after Jamie's wife tragically died in a car accident, he persuades her sister, Ava, to accompany him to the accident site to perform a peculiar ritual. As the night progresses, it becomes evident that Jamie harbours sinister motives.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. programme.title: The Occupant
programme.desc: Following the death of their mother, four estranged siblings find themselves fighting for their inheritance and their lives when an eccentric stranger arrives, claiming their haunted childhood home was left to her. They start to experience strange, inexplicable manifestations, which have malevolent effects on everyone in the house.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: Fate Jealous Greed
programme.desc: The film consists of three short horror stories: a man tries to survive after he received a haunted mail predicting his death; while a man mourns the death of his beloved wife, she becomes a ghost and tries to communicate with him; three brothers clash over the care options of their elderly mother during dinner, leading to a terrifying murder.

programme.title: The Getaway
programme.desc: Three KOLs set out to livestream their trip to a remote island, but are deceived by a mysterious old woman who traps them there, intent on finding brides for her disabled grandsons. As they are captured, they must race against time to escape.

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Night Watch
programme.desc: After a car accident erases his memory, Wang Ren Jie takes on a job as a night guard. As the clock strikes midnight, he reports for duty at the abandoned building, only to find three lost souls awaiting him, and unravels a revenge plot at the same time. Is this fate or a curse cast by vengeful spirits?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Lexy's life becomes a living nightmare after surviving a huge white shark attack in which her father and sister died. However, with the help of a psychiatrist, she delves deeper into the haunting flashbacks and gradually uncovers the truth of what happened that fateful night.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: People in charming Hope Mills, are on edge when a high school freshman vanishes while on her way to meet a friend. When she turns up dead three weeks later, the community rallies to flush out the killer.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A shooting suspect begins cutting himself with a pocket knife after investigators leave him alone in the interrogation room; a woman breaks down after telling police that she drowned her grandmother.

programme.title: Interrogation Cam
programme.desc: A man breaks down sobbing after admitting to stabbing his mom; an actress tells detectives how and why she shot her estranged uncle; a suspected murderer tries to broker an immunity deal; and more.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S1)
programme.desc: A serial killer faces tough questions in the interrogation room and after a woman is found dead in the middle of the road, the finger pointing begins when three suspects are interviewed.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A traveling nurse is pulled over for a traffic violation in New Mexico and is arrested for felony burglary carried out in her home state of Ohio. Is she a thug for hire or innocent with a rock-solid alibi?

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4)
programme.desc: A man falls asleep while driving and kills a construction worker on the road. Was he a reckless driver or an innocent man with an undiagnosed medical condition?

programme.title: Butchers Of The Bayou
programme.desc: Charlotte Murray Pace, an LSU graduate, is found raped and stabbed to death in her home. The brutality of the crime scene reminds police of the unsolved case of Gina Wilson Green.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: On his last day as an undercover agent, Bergen County Detective Carlos James experiences his first shootout, and ATF Agent Jenn Eskew poses as a hitwoman to investigate a possible murder for hire.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: What begins as an open-and-shut case spins into a full-on investigation when a mother and son are found dead in their home. Was this a murder/suicide, or could someone else have been responsible?

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: Christine and Jason Harris fell in love young. Christina finds Jason caring and supportive and after marrying, they have two children. But then Christina makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?
programme.desc: An unlicensed midwife assists a home birth that ends in tragedy. The defence says she made the right calls, but the prosecution charges her with negligent child abuse resulting in death.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: When a teenager is found shot and dumped in the street, detectives struggle to figure out who he is and where he was killed.

programme.title: Murder At The Motel
programme.desc: July 1, 2021, Falls Township, Pennsylvania. Falls Township Police are dispatched to the New Falls Motel after receiving a call about an unresponsive female.

programme.title: Meet, Marry, Murder (S1)
programme.desc: After meeting at a salsa club, Lulu and Ramon Sosa find they make a good team and marry. But after having financial difficulties, the relationship breaks down.

programme.title: City Confidential (S8)
programme.desc: When an infant's body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: CI Asia: Marked By A Rapist
programme.desc: A man rapes all the females inside an establishment at gunpoint. He remains at large until he leaves his fingerprints on a bubble tea cup at a shop, which helps the police investigate the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: The Rifkin Murders
programme.desc: Joel Rifkin is providing clues to New York State Police in order to identify two of his 17 victims that remain nameless. Peter Reiss follows up with his own on-camera sit-down with Rifkin to get answers.

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La Grande Galerie Francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Intrieurs
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to Beauvaisis, reputed for clay work and its factories. Then, she discovers a huge secondhand shop where Gaylord, its owner, stores objects that he has carefully chosen and retrieved by clearing uninhabited houses in the region.

programme.title: Nature En Symbiose
programme.desc: In the maquis, the Mediterranean climate rules unopposed. Sizzling summers, mild winters and violent thunderstorms that drench the landscape, in spring as in autumn. Such harsh seasonal variations leave the flora and fauna with no choice but to cooperate.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Tlvisions editorial team.

programme.title: Tlmatin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Tlmatin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Champions D'Exception
programme.desc: Summary: Immersion within the France collective on the occasion of the 4th edition of the Women's Wheelchair Rugby Cup; interview with Anne-lizabeth d'Acremont, wheelchair rugby player, who introduces us to her sport; discovery of the Soliroues association, which practices wheelchair roller.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot prepares a snapper fish and chips.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Tljournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Intrieurs
programme.desc: Anne-Catherine Verwaerde goes to Beauvaisis, reputed for clay work and its factories. Then, she discovers a huge secondhand shop where Gaylord, its owner, stores objects that he has carefully chosen and retrieved by clearing uninhabited houses in the region.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Bote !
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Ytili
programme.desc: Nina and Lon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Ytili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Ytili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou
programme.desc: The High Priestess and Aunt Amlan join forces to overcome the soldiers. Pokou climbs a mango tree but each time she tries to pick its fruit it grows taller.

programme.title: La Petite Pokou
programme.desc: Pokou plays a game of mancala with the High Priestess. Lucio is still finding it difficult to finish the dishes the Komians give him. The last remaining Denkyra soldiers flee in all directions.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itinraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lvy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enqute, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Un Alibi
programme.desc: Maude, Pierre and Tom, friends of longstanding, meet up for a birthday party at Max and Lucie's. When they arrive they find Max kneeling beside Lucie's body. His guilt seems obvious. His friends, convinced he's innocent, decide to give him an alibi. But will the group withstand the police investigation?

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Selon La Police
programme.desc: One morning, Ping-Pong, a cop used to working the streets, burns his police ID card and disappears without trace in Toulouse. For a day and a night, his colleagues search for him in the city and his home neighbourhood. But each hour that passes brings Ping-Pong closer to his destiny...

programme.title: File D'Attente
programme.desc: Margot's Alzheimer's disease is progressing and Louis now lives with his mother. lonore is forced to rest. Alice has been suffering from depression since she learnt that Laurent was having an affair with her ex, Manon.

programme.title: File D'Attente
programme.desc: Alice makes her grand return to work but a colleague decides to make her life difficult. Laurie-Lou visits the library with her mother, Nathalie. But things don't go quite as planned.

programme.title: File D'Attente
programme.desc: Margot has gone missing: Louis and Sophie have no choice but to call the police. Dominique finds she has plenty in common with Tony. lonore moves into her grandfather's garage.

programme.title: File D'Attente
programme.desc: Since giving birth, lonore feels she's going round in circles and is having difficulty finding something new to motivate her. Laurie-Lou, accompanied by Louis and Margot, visit her mother in hospital.

programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: Celeste
programme.desc: Living in the lush rainforest of Northern Queensland, a retired opera diva prepares for one final performance. Her late husband's son Jack arrives, haunted by the past, only to discover that Celeste has one last request for him.

programme.title: Snow
programme.desc: In the heart of winter, several notables are found murdered. To advance investigations, Captain Delhaye decides to bring Juliette Hmon out of prison for a few days. The young woman had been imprisoned some years earlier for a strangely similar case.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Red Eagle
programme.desc: A Summit between France, England, Portugal and the Pope is to take place in Spain, under the guise of looking for a solution to the conflict between Spain and Portugal; but the ulterior motive is to attack the Kingdom of Spain.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: With Or Without You
programme.desc: A young woman, her free-spirited mother and a West African man find themselves on an unexpected road trip that leads to emotional transformation.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Passed by Censor
programme.desc: In an Istanbul prison, Zakir is tasked with reading and censoring the letters inmates receive. Tasked with a writing assignment for his night class, Zakir uses a photograph of an inmate's wife for inspiration, but fantasy soon morphs into delusion.

programme.title: Oskar & Lilli: Where No One Knows Us
programme.desc: Chechen siblings Oskar and Lilli face deportation from Austria but are separated in foster care after their mothers suicide attempt. Meeting in secret, the siblings hold onto hope that they will reunite as a family someday.

programme.title: King of Devil's Island
programme.desc: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom? Based on a true story.

programme.title: The Exception
programme.desc: Four women working at an NGO investigating war crimes are shaken when two of them receive death threats. While they Initially blame a Serbian war criminal, their suspicions turn on each other when a case of bullying in the office escalates.

With a handful of core ingredients, a well-stocked pantry, and a few pro tips, Mark shows how anyone can create restaurant-worthy meals in their own kitchen.

programme.title: Run Up!
programme.desc: After a life-altering accident shatters her dreams, Elodie, a young hiker turned paraplegic, discovers the power of wheelchair sports. With the help of her trainer Isabelle, she is able to awaken from her lethargy and recognize true victories in life.

programme.title: Murders on the Frioul Islands
programme.desc: When a renowned editor is found dead on stage during a play, young Captain Victor Mariani is put in charge of the case. But tensions rise and secrets surface when his father Pierre, a retired commissioner and old friend of the victim, joins the case.

programme.title: Not Here To Be Loved
programme.desc: Jean-Claude is a disillusioned middle-age man who has long forgotten to smile. He is divorced, has a strained relationship with his only son and thinks his father never loved him. Then, he steps in to a tango school and meets Francoise and life changes.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Looking For Jacques
programme.desc: Based on a book and an original TV series from the 80s, Carina is a journalist digging into the disappearance of Jacques, a successful author. She is desperate for a juicy story to land a great job but the more she finds out, the less she wants to share.

programme.title: Oskar & Lilli: Where No One Knows Us
programme.desc: Chechen siblings Oskar and Lilli face deportation from Austria but are separated in foster care after their mothers suicide attempt. Meeting in secret, the siblings hold onto hope that they will reunite as a family someday.

programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sbastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: King of Devil's Island
programme.desc: Norwegian winter, early 20th century. On the boys home Bastoy, a new inmate leads the boys to a violent uprising against a brutal regime. How far is he willing to go to attain freedom? Based on a true story.

programme.title: Open Door
programme.desc: Rudina embarks on a road trip with her pregnant sister Elma back to their Albanian hometown. However, Elma is unmarried, and they need to find someone to play the part of her husband in order not to anger their traditional father.

programme.title: The Exception
programme.desc: Four women working at an NGO investigating war crimes are shaken when two of them receive death threats. While they Initially blame a Serbian war criminal, their suspicions turn on each other when a case of bullying in the office escalates.

programme.title: Backwards
programme.desc: Inspired by true events. The story of a young mother of an autistic boy, whose many years of stubbornness and the fight against bureaucracy and human heartlessness led to changes in the education system.

programme.title: Mediterranea
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: Temporaries
programme.desc: Ariane gets a job as an interpreter at a food plant after moving back to the Richelieu Valley following a breakup. There, she finds herself torn between obeying the harsh demands of her boss and standing up for the exploited migrant workers she befriends.
